name: KidsBible
0:
”Alexa open kids bible and tell me something”
”Alexa launch kids bible and tell me something”
”Alexa start kids bible and tell me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kids bible
des: This skill helps you to learn the Bible in a easy fun filled way. Everytime you ask for something Alexa tells you a nice information about the bible. This will help to learn new things and spend time fruitfully.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
